CompanyFacade - Class in shabtay.coupon.system.facade
Class CompanyFacade gives the Company to perfrom the following actions: create new coupon, remove Coupon, update Coupon, get Coupon by Id, get Coupon by type, get Coupon by name, get all coupons, get coupons by date, get coupons by price
